title: Short-Intensive Legal Foundations Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Lack of basic legal knowledge or exemption from first-year coursework
context.additional_context: Online supplementary learning program addressing foundational knowledge gaps encountered by professionals entering law degree programs

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain fundamental legal concepts (contract law, criminal law, constitutional law, etc., in three areas) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze legal documents (case analysis, statutory interpretation) with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can complete over 80% of online learning modules and actively participate at least once in real-time discussions.

resources: 12 Sets of Moodle-Based Video Lectures (Approx. 15 Minutes Each)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
